resources.string: Stroke Input Method 筆畫輸入法
Welcome to Stroke Input Method!\n歡迎使用筆畫輸入法！
If you have installed Stroke Input Method for the first time, you must manually enable it in the system settings before it can be used: \n若首次安裝筆畫輸入法，必先在系統設定人手啟動，方能使用：
Input method settings 輸入法設定
If your existing input method provides no means of switching keyboards: \n若現有之輸入法無以轉鍵盤：
Test input here 在此測試輸入
